info.name: Twitter in the Sidebar #NewTwitter [obsolete]
info.description:
>>> YOU CANNOT USE THIS STYLE NO MORE <<<
>>> Because of the change of Twitter! <<<

How to use:
1. Go to: http://twitter.com/?sidebar
2. Bookmark the page.
3. Search the above bookmark in your bookmark lists and right click it to select "Properties".
4. Tick "Load this bookmark in the sidebar" checkbox. 5. Close "Properties" and open Twitter from the bookmark. Enjoy!

If you have installed "Twitter in the Sidebar"(http://userstyles.org/styles/24782), Turn off that style and install this style.
